  • Uses of CacheInvalidationPolicy in org.eclipse.persistence.descriptors.invalidation

    Subclasses of CacheInvalidationPolicy in org.eclipse.persistence.descriptors.invalidation
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DailyCacheInvalidationPolicy
    PUBLIC: A CacheInvalidationPolicy that allows objects to expire every day at a specific time.
    class 
    NoExpiryCacheInvalidationPolicy
    PUBLIC: A cache invalidation policy in which no objects will expire.
    class 
    TimeToLiveCacheInvalidationPolicy
    PUBLIC: A CacheInvalidationPolicy which allows objects to live for a specific amount of time after they are read.
